'''Ingenuity of the Forest Forager''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Ingenuity of the Forest Forager is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Sumeru]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a [[Remarkable Chest]] after breaking all nearby [[Weathered Rock]]s in [[Wadi Al-Majuj]].
